about_me.name: Ekaterina
about_me.description: I was born in Rostov-on-Don, Russia, now I live in Israel, Haifa. I've got my bachelor's degree in Linguistics as a translator of the English and German languages. In 2022, I decided to change my career and started studying web development. Also, I like mobile development on React Native. In my free time, I am also fond of 3D modeling and sculpting.
